I looked around on the site, and I couldn't find any rules anywhere. If anyone could help me out by telling me what they are/where to find them that would be good. Just since I recently made a game that could potentially break one.

Thanks,
WayTooCasualGamer

Posts.EditableText:
The only rules I know about are: 

1) Keep the forums clean. No profanity/adult discussions or example. Because children use this site and those under 18. 

2) If your game has adult content make sure to mark it so. 

3) Not really a rule but more of a common courtesy; thank those who help you, don't double post if no one catches your first post and don't bump your post. If you don't get an answer to a question it is likely that nobody knows the answer. Be respectful :)
Posts.HTML:
The only rules I know about are:

  1. Keep the forums clean. No profanity/adult discussions or example. Because children use this site and those under 18.

  2. If your game has adult content make sure to mark it so.

  3. Not really a rule but more of a common courtesy; thank those who help you, don't double post if no one catches your first post and don't bump your post. If you don't get an answer to a question it is likely that nobody knows the answer. Be respectful :)

Posts.EditableText: There is a rule about copyright too. Make sure you have permission if you using someone else's creative work.
Posts.HTML: There is a rule about copyright too. Make sure you have permission if you using someone else's creative work.
